input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product specification.

Product specification:
Stero Dishwasher P56-1684 22-5/8"X17" Curtain 

Product keywords:
Genuine OEM replacement part
Stero was founded over 60-years ago in the restaurant mecca of San Francisco and manufactures dishwashers that get the job done
Use genuine OEM parts for safety reliability and performance

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This is a dishwasher part. It was made by Stero, a company that makes dishwashers. It is a replacement part, so you should only use it if your dishwasher is broken. Using the right parts for your dishwasher is important for it to work properly and safely.
input_text.Response B: The Stero Dishwasher P56-1684 Curtain is a genuine OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) part that fits various models of Stero dishwashers. It is made of durable and reliable plastic material that resists corrosion and ensures long-lasting use. The curtain measures 22-5/8" x 17" and is easy to install. It is an important part of the dishwasher that helps to keep the water inside and prevents it from leaking out. Use genuine OEM parts for safety, reliability, and performance. Stero was founded over 60-years ago in the restaurant mecca of San Francisco and manufactures dishwashers that can meet the demanding needs of any commercial kitchen.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
